name: snappy-canvas
description: Canvas where everything is snapped to nearest pixel

scripts.build: npm run build-es5 && npm run build-dist && npm run build-uglify
scripts.build-dist: mkdir -p dist && browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -s SnappyCanvas lib/index.js -o dist/snappy-canvas.js
scripts.watchify: mkdir -p dist && watchify -v -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -s SnappyCanvas lib/index.js -o dist/snappy-canvas.js

author: Wanadev <http://www.wanadev.fr/>
